title: SAMSUNG 253 l Frost Free Double Door 2 Star Refrigerator  (Gray silver, RT28A3032GS/HL)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Refrigerator Unit, User Manual, Warranty Card
product_specification.Installation & Demo: Authorised Service Engineer will install the Refrigerator, make it operational and explain the below details. 1. How to Use, 2. Features,3. Do's and Dont's.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 10 Years on Compressor From Samsung
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic, Glassware, Bulb, Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.Digital Inverter Technology: This refrigerator is equipped with a Digital Inverter compressor which is capable of adjusting its speed to keep up with the cooling requirements. Thanks to this feature, this refrigerator makes less noise, provides you with energy efficiency, and serves your cooling and freezing requirements for a long time.
product_description.Stabilizer-free Operation: Designed to work reliably and steadily without a stabilizer, this refrigerator automatically severs the power in case of power fluctuations or increase in voltage to keep your refrigerator safeguarded from electrical damage.

review: Awesome superb I like it I love it wow really superb 👌👌✌️✌️

Ordering from an an online platform is very risky for many people but this refrigerator is worth of it.
Nice quality and classy look.
Fast installation within one day of delivery.
Sleak and smooth compressor.
No vibrations and no sound.
Great work flipkart and samsung.
JUST LOVED IT 😍❤
Its has a sleek design thats what attracted me... samsung is always stylish and one of the best brand... product is very good...

Product is very nice and works perfectly.
Got 2 days delivery from Flipkart.
Installation was done by Samsung within 24 hrs

Overall satisfied with the product.
Let's see how it performs in the long run.

Seems a good buy. 2 features kind of hooks us -
1) one of the tray is sliding, helps in keeping delicate items
2) vegetable bucket has a bit of slanting design, helps pushing it back easily.

Improvements we could have loved -
1) freezer could have one more tray

Hope this helps.

Beautiful minimalist design outside, clean back and properly featured trays and compartment inside.

Performance is stunning with efficient cooling and consumes 243 units per year.

Coming to features it has deordourizer so no stinky fridge, Cool in freezer keeps thing frozen upto 10 hrs, tall bottle guard is a must for storing those big cola bottle or jars.
Sliding tray is very useful for storing cake and liquids.

Installation was on time by Samsung representative and briefed all do's and don'ts.
Only thing that Samsung can work on is putting a lock and adding silver colour to the sides.

The fridge is perfect. Does its job perfectly. Give it 24 hours to unlock its full cooling potential.

Reason for 4 star is because the fridge has cracked interior. Ramthalla Retail was the seller - I don't know if it was damaged from factory, in their shop or during transit but it was.

I didn't return it because it works fine - applied a bit of tape to cover it. I also appreciate delivery during tough COVID times. But yeah, just be sure to check fridge thoroughly when engineer comes for installation, back side, inside (remove all trays, etc.)

Stay safe!

Flipkart delivered it on time, but the only sore point was,here in Sivasagar, Assam, flipkart doesn't delivery the appliances doorstep. They assign it to a third-party delivery agent, who just dropped the product in front of our housing complexs and I had to pay some labourers 200 bucks to get it delivered to my 5th floor flat. Infact the delivery agent flatly refused to deliver it to my flat.
Otherwise the product is very good, truly Value for money,nice looking too. No noise whatsoever, cooling is excellent. Big storage space for 2 ltr bottles and egg tray for 16 eggs. Comes with Coolpad/coolpack
Value for money.best design and features in segment.
